channel.title: Where do I add loot to Barrows? [317]
channel.description:
317:
ATM Barrows is only dropping a few nats, deaths and ashes.
I can't find where to add items to the chest, I don't need a huge detailed tut, if someone could just gimme the name of the file it's in that'ld be sweet.
Cheers ;D

item.title: Where do I add loot to Barrows? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Fuck I don’t want to be annoying but that’s where I thought it was but all I can find is:

//ahrim
npcdrop = 2025 7297 1 100
//dharok
npcdrop = 2026 7299 1 100
//guthan
npcdrop = 2027 7302 1 100
//karil
npcdrop = 2028 6084 1 100
//torag
npcdrop = 2029 432 1 100
//verac
npcdrop = 2030 709 1 100

Are you sure it would be in Npcdrops? Bcus I’m trying to change the items that the Chest gives out, Not the actual Barrow bros.

All the Chest drops is Nats, Deaths, Bolt Racks and Ashes I’ve tried searching for those codes in NPC drops and had no results.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I add loot to Barrows? [317]

item.title: Where do I add loot to Barrows? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

usman555:

npcdrops.cfg

WHAT THE FUCK, That was the quickest answer ever lmfao thanks.

Read full topic
